nodes.text: The Sinsang system was located in the Raioballo sector, a part of the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It was situated on the hyperlane known as the Veragi Trade Route, which connected it to the Anx Minor and Dantooine systems. The star system contained the world Sinsang. Between 4 ABY and 12 ABY, the Sinsang system was situated within the Pentastar Alignment's boundaries.
The Sinsang system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-4.
